text: Plymouth Arrow was the nameplate used for multiple captive imports made by Mitsubishi Motors and sold by the Chrysler Corporation under the Plymouth marque: * The Mitsubishi Celeste, a compact car also sold as the Plymouth Arrow from 1976 to 1980 * The Mitsubishi Forte, a compact pickup truck also sold as the Plymouth Arrow from 1979 to 1982 Arrow de:Plymouth Arrow
title: Plymouth Arrow
